#summary Some notes on using the XmlDirectoryListing class in Java applications
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

== !XmlDirectoryListing in Java apps == 

Please feel free to use the !XmlDirectoryListing class in your Java applications. The binary distribution comes with a Javadoc API.

The class uses [http://logging.apache.org log4j] which can be extended in your application.

The [http://xml-dir-listing.googlecode.com/svn/tags/version_0.1/lib/xml-dir-listing.dtd Doctype] may also be of interest.
